Summary: Craft descended/hovered/ascended/no noise. Was spherical/ball shaped. Looked like windows&hanger bay.
divs: sighting detailsi was at that time a police officer of 6 years, had a commercial\instrument pilots license with approx. 400 hours\majority of time flying southern ca, and was a 10 year navy veteran whom had seen all navy aircraft and majority of air force planes. i went outside my motorhome at approx. 7 am to walk my dog. it was overcast with very fine mist. i always looked at el cajon mountain. i could see the approx. lower two thirds of the mountain. while i was looking at the mountain i saw an unknown craft descending through the overcast. from what i could see, it looked like i could see approx. one fifth of a spherical object. it was tannish brown in color. i could see what looked two levels of what looked two windows and a hanger deck off set from each other. the part of the craft i could see blocked out one third of el cajon mountain. i could see a partial shadow of the craft. the craft hovered for approx. two minutes. it then slowly ascended. throughout the sighting i could hear no sound from the craft. the craft looked like no flying object i had ever seen and behaved like no plane or hot air balloon. i lost sight of the craft when ascended above the overcast level. i was awe struck at the sight and size of the craft. i could not believe that a craft of that size could move so gracefully and quietly.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Lakeside
There were no other sightings in Lakeside on or around May 20th 1994
